IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PROVIDING DIRECT AND INDIRECT FUNDING FOR SCHOLARSHIPS, FACILITIES, SALARY SUPPLEMENTS, AND OTHER SUPPORT FOR THE UNIVERSITY OF MISSISSIPPI DEPARTMENT OF INTERCOLLEGIATE ATHLETICS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: PROVIDING DIRECT AND INDIRECT FUNDING FOR SCHOLARSHIPS, FACILITIES, SALARY SUPPLEMENTS, AND OTHER SUPPORT FOR THE UNIVERSITY OF MISSISSIPPI DEPARTMENT OF INTERCOLLEGIATE ATHLETICS.
IRS990.Desc: THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDED FINANCIAL SUPPORT TO THE UNIVERSITY OF MISSISSIPPI FOR MAJOR FACILITIES CONSTRUCTION AND IMPROVEMENTS ON THE CAMPUS DURING THIS FISCAL YEAR. THE ORGANIZATION ALSO PROVIDED SIGNIFICANT SALARY SUPPLEMENTS TO UNIVERSITY STAFF MEMBERS AND BOTH DIRECTLY AND INDIRECTLY SUPPORTED THE UNIVERSITY WITH FUNDING FOR SCHOLARSHIPS AND OTHER SUPPORT FOR THE UNIVERSITY'S ATHLETIC PROGRAMS AND SCHOLAR ATHLETES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TO SUPPORT FOOTBALL, BASKETBALL, AND WOMEN'S OPERATIONS, AND SCHOLARSHIPS

THE FOUNDATION HAD NO SIGNIFICANT UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AT JUNE 30, 2018 AND 2017, RESPECTIVELY. IF INTEREST AND PENALTIES ARE INCURRED RELATED TO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS, SUCH AMOUNTS ARE RECOGNIZED AS INCOME TAX EXPENSE IN THE STATEMENT OF CHANGES IN NET ASSETS AVAILABLE FOR BENEFITS. AS OF JUNE 30, 2018, TAX PERIODS FOR TAX YEARS 2017, 2016, AND 2015 REMAIN OPEN TO EXAMINATION BY THE FEDERAL AND STATE TAXING JURISDICTIONS TO WHICH THE FOUNDATION IS SUBJECT.
NET INVESTMENT ACTIVITY AND TRANSFERS BETWEEN TR AND UR FUNDS
NET INVESTMENT ACTIVITY AND TRANSFERS BETWEEN TR AND UR FUNDS

THE COACHES' INCENTIVE COMPENSATION CONTRACTS ARE BASED ON TEAM ACCOMPLISHMENTS. SEVERANCE PAYMENTS TO FORMER COACHES AND OTHER FORMER PERSONNEL ARE BASED ON CONTRACTS. EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR INCENTIVE COMPENSATION IS BASED ON OVERALL PERFORMANCE.
COMPENSATION FROM RELATED ORGANIZATIONS: WENDELL WEAKLEY - UNIVERSITY OF MISSISSIPPI FOUNDATION ALL OTHER OFFICERS, EMPLOYEES, FORMER - UNIVERSITY OF MISSISSIPPI

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DISCLOSURES ARE REQUIRED TO BE UPDATED ANNUALLY WITH STATEMENTS THAT ASSURE NO CONFLICTS OF INTEREST OR FULL DESCRIPTIONS OF ANY POTENTIAL CONFLICTS OF INTEREST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR'S COMPENSATION IS DETERMINED BY THE ATHLETICS DIRECTOR AND THE BOARD OF GOVERNORS. OTHER EMPLOYEE COMPENSATION IS RECOMMENDED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND APPROVED BY THE BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND FORMS 990 ARE AVAILABLE ONLINE AND OTHER GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE FOR PUBLIC INSPECTION AT THE ORGANIZATION'S OFFICE.
